rules: Video element must be object-cover w-full h-full absolute inset-0 -z-10
UI controls must float on top with z-50
Bottom bar: Capture Button + Gallery Toggle + Filters
NO white backgrounds. All UI must be transparent/glass.
Main content area with generous padding
Gallery grid: Masonry layout for mixed aspect ratios

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: The Guest Camera flow is the most important part. It must feel NATIVE.
Use 'react-webcam' or native 'navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia' for the camera.
Implement filters using CSS filters (grayscale, sepia, contrast) applied to the video feed AND the captured canvas.
For the Host Dashboard, use Shadcn components but override the background to #050505.
Ensure the 'Counter' (3/5) is always visible and pulses when a photo is taken.
Use 'framer-motion' for the flash effect and gallery entrance animations.
Do not use 'Inter'. Use 'Manrope' for UI and 'Syne' for headings.
Ensure all touch targets on mobile are at least 44px.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
